short_summary: Request for Proposal for various gases including delivery, recovery and location of the gas cylinders located in Longueuil (Québec)

full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Title (English):** H4005-235017-2 Gas Cylinders Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Title (French):** H4005-235017-2 Cylindres de Gaz Déclaration de Désir de Prix (DDP)

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4399511848-Doc4498344242

**Public Publication Notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19163827?extsite=MTkxNjM4MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Introduction**
We are pleased to announce the release of a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the acquisition of various gases, including delivery, recovery, and location of gas cylinders. Department of Health (HC) is seeking to award a contract for the supply of these gases, which are detailed in Annex - Statement of Requirements. **Contract Close Date:** 2024-04-05T14:00:00.

**Contract Description**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) supersedes the previous RFP solicitation, Doc4399568421, with a closing date of February 15, 2024. Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided to interested bidders/suppliers upon request.

**Organizational Information**

* **The Procuring Entity (Buyer):** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **End User:** Department of Health (HC)
* **Contracting Authority Name:** Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **End User Address:** Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

**Selection Criteria:**
The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

**Experience Bidding:**
To participate, amend and submit your RFP response in writing by the contract close date. Specific instructions and the necessary information to supply are outlined in the Statement of Requirements at Annex.

**Additional Terms and Conditions**
The complete RFP detailing all terms and conditions can be found online. Please find the above publication notice URL to access the complete RFP and all annexes.

Each of the questions will be addressed, and comments can respond as they will be answering at each step of the way.
